


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->

# ```js isTablet ```


Detect if is a tablet device

## Parameters

- **ua** (navigator.userAgent) String: The user agent on which to make the test



## Example (js)

```js
import isTablet from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/tablet'
if (isTablet()) {
  // do something cool...
}
```
